nfortunately, Asterisk/FreePBX doesn't work much for me with V4.

I played a little with the cgi commands of V4 20181030. So that I know what is possible, 
I extracted the firmware and examined the main program "sonia" from the user-x.cramfs.img/bin directory.
I found the following:

Code:
/cgi-bin/configFileExport.backup?action=All&sessionId=*
/cgi-bin/configFileExport.backup?Security-cgi=1&salt=*
/cgi-bin/Snapshot.cgi*
/cgi-bin/Snapshot.cgi?Security-cgi=1&salt=*
/SubscribeNotify.cgi?sessionId=*
/SubscribeNotify.cgi?Security-cgi=1&salt=*
/cgi-bin/RadiometryManager.cgi?action=notifyRadioData&sessionId=*
/cgi-bin/RadiometryManager.cgi?Security-cgi=1&salt=*
/cgi-bin/audio.cgi?action=postAudio*
/cgi-bin/*
url %s http cgi forbid~!
[WebApp cgiTime] url->%s
[WebApp cgiTime] cost %llu =
Security-cgi
